azurerm_logic_app_trigger_custom.description: Manages a Custom Trigger within a Logic App Workflow

name.description: Specifies the name of the HTTP Trigger to be created within the Logic App Workflow. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.
name.notes: This name must be unique across all Triggers within the Logic App Workflow.

logic_app_id.description: Specifies the ID of the Logic App Workflow. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

body.description: Specifies the JSON Blob defining the Body of this Custom Trigger.
body.notes: To make the Trigger more readable, you may wish to consider using HEREDOC syntax (as shown above) or [the `local_file` resource](https://www.terraform.io/docs/providers/local/d/file.html) to load the schema from a file on disk.

id.description: The ID of the Trigger within the Logic App Workflow.

create.description: Used when creating the Logic App Custom Trigger.

update.description: Used when updating the Logic App Custom Trigger.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Logic App Custom Trigger.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Logic App Custom Trigger.
